original_text: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
korean_text: 그 때에 그들의 노여움이 우리에게 맹렬하여 우리를 산채로 삼켰을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Then they had swallowed us up quick
when their wrath was kindled against us:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 분노가 우리에게 향하여 타올랐을 때
